name: They Perish
description:
A first person multiplayer zombies arcade that takes inspiration from Call of Duty Zombies and my own life. Essentially my take on that type of gameplay.  This is also my first large game in general so I'm learning as I go :)

The first two maps I plan and HOPE to make are a small starter map that takes place on a sunny day in a South-Floridian park that acts as an intro and a Mustang High School, a school in a snowy mountainous region during sunset.

I'm having lots of great ideas as I'm working on this, but I'll try not to mention anything here that won't be implemented a.k.a I don't wanna set up false expectations for game ideas I can't implement (I'm just one guy).
